DOC.brief_summary: Chronic Bronchiolitis or Resistant Asthma? Testing a way to diagnosis and treatment
DOC.criteria: Difficult asthma Patients with potential allergic bronchopulmonary aspergillosis i.e. with peripheral blood eosinophilia, sputum eosinophilia, or any sputum production and bronchiectasis A history of smoking Significant occupational or environmental exposures Evidence on emphysema on chest high resolution computed tomography (HRCT) scan
